GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: cnl: Do not process IPC reply before firmware boot

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 230f646085d17a008b609eb8fe8befb8811868f0. For more details please see the references link.
